---
title: DeleteSchedule
tags:
  - workflow automation
  - workflow
  - Delete Schedule
  - workflow automation API
metaDescription: "Deletes the schedule of a workflow definition. Note, this doesnâ€™t stop already running workflow instance."
freshnessValidatedDate: never
---

Deletes the schedule of a workflow definition. Note, this doesn't stop any currently executing workflow run (use the StopWorkflowRun mutation).

## Input parameters

<table>
  <thead>
    <tr>
      <th style={{ width: "200px" }}>Parameter</th>
      <th>Type</th>
      <th>Required</th>
      <th>Description</th>
    </tr>
  </thead>
  <tbody>
    <tr>
      <td>`accountId`</td>
      <td>Number</td>
      <td>Yes</td>
      <td>Your account ID.</td>
    </tr>
    <tr>
      <td>`schedule.id`</td>
      <td>String</td>
      <td>Yes</td>
      <td>The unique identifier of the schedule to delete. Obtained from `CreateSchedule` or `GetSchedules` APIs.</td>
    </tr>
  </tbody>
</table>

## Sample request

Use the [Query Builder](https://one.newrelic.com/nerdgraph-graphiql?state=fc314f67-101e-a54a-169a-191d1fd41fd) to create and edit a workflow. See [NerdGraph API explorer](/docs/apis/nerdgraph/get-started/nerdgraph-explorer).

  ```graphql
      mutation {
        workflowAutomationDeleteSchedule(
          accountId: 11933347
          schedule: {id: "1a71d299-82c2-4b4d-9803-b14523e3a9e7"}
        ) {
          scheduleId
        }
      }
  ```

## Sample response

The mutation returns:

- `scheduleId`: The unique identifier of the deleted schedule.

If the `schedule.id` is not found, an error is returned:

  ```graphql
    {
      "data": {
        "workflowAutomationDeleteSchedule": null
      },
      "extensions": {
        "nrOnly": {
          "_docs": "https://pages.datanerd.us/unified-api/nerdgraph-documentation/querying/debugging/",
          "httpRequestLog": [
            {
              "curl": "curl -i -X GET 'https://authorization.service.nr-ops.net/access/v1/accounts/11933347' -H 'x-login-context: access-token:'"
            }
          ]
        }
      },
      "errors": [
        {
          "message": "Access restricted",
          "path": [
            "workflowAutomationDeleteSchedule"
          ],
          "extensions": {
            "errorClass": "ACCESS_DENIED",
            "nrOnly": {}
          },
          "locations": [
            {
              "line": 2,
              "column": 3
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ```
